item.description:
SATURDAY SEPTEMBER 26 2009 at 7:30 pm Join the Hartford Symphony Orchestra and The CT Theatre Group

RACHMANINOFF PIANO CONCERTI

featuring Van Cliburn International Piano Competition
Gold & Silver Medalists

Mortensen Hall at The Bushnell Center for the Performing Arts

Edward Cumming, conductor

Haochen Zhang, piano

Yeol Eum Son, piano

Rachmaninoff Concerto No. 2

Rachmaninoff Concerto No. 3

We will meet before and after the show for wine or coffee,
meet the CT Theatre Group guests, and to talk Arts and Theatre

Meeting location and time will be emailed to CT Theatre Group Ticket Holders

Tickets are $32.50

BUY ONLINE AND GET OUR GROUP DISCOUNT
Only $25 While Tickets Remain

WE HAVE A VERY LIMITED NUMBER OF TICKETS IN THE CT THEATRE GROUP SECTION
THIS EVENT WILL SELL OUT - GET YOUR TICKET NOW

Click on Buy Now and use Credit or Debit Card or call (860) 987-7888

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: THIS SATURDAY Van RACHMANINOFF PIANO CONCERTI featuring Van Cliburn -Bushnell
